```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("My Little App"),
  numericInput("num", "Pick a number:", value = 10),
  textOutput("result")
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$result <- renderText({
    paste("You chose:", input$num)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
